dcterms:creator: A. Hasegawa
M. Wakatani
dcterms:description: The Hasegawa-Wakatani equations model two-dimensional electrostatic drift-wave turbulence in a slab geometry and have been studied extensively in plasma physics research.
dcterms:title: Hasegawa-Wakatani equations (HW equations)

dcterms:creator: R. Greif
F. Jenko
N. Thuerey
dcterms:description: Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) data used for training reduced-order models for the Hasegawa-Wakatani equations.
dcterms:title: Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) data

dcterms:creator: R. Greif
dcterms:description: High-fidelity simulation data for the Hasegawa-Wakatani model, providing a reference implementation for plasma turbulence in fusion reactors.
dcterms:title: High-fidelity simulation data

dcterms:creator: I. R. Goumiri
C. W. Rowley
Z. Ma
D. A. Gates
J. A. Krommes
J. B. Parker
dcterms:description: Data on particle flux and resistive dissipation rate, which are key quantities of interest in the Hasegawa-Wakatani model.
dcterms:title: Particle flux (Γn) and resistive dissipation rate (Γc)
